mapper.select: SELECT A.MEETING_NO, A.MEETING_NAME, A.MEETING_COUNT, A.IMAGE, A.CAPACITY, A.MEETING_START_AT, A.MEETING_END_AT, A.CATEGORY, A.MEETING_CONTENT, A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_GENDER, A.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_BIRTHYEAR, A.USER_BIRTHDATE, A.USER_PROFILE, A.USER_INTRODUCE, A.USER_GRADE FROM (SELECT M.MEETING_NO, M.MEETING_NAME, M.MEETING_COUNT, M.IMAGE, M.CAPACITY, M.MEETING_START_AT, M.MEETING_END_AT, M.CATEGORY, M.MEETING_CONTENT, U.USER_NO, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_GENDER, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_BIRTHYEAR, U.USER_BIRTHDATE, U.USER_PROFILE, U.USER_INTRODUCE, U.USER_GRADE FROM MEETING_T AS M INNER JOIN USER_T AS U ON M.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) AS A ORDER BY M.MEETING_NO ASC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}

SELECT A.MEETING_NO, A.MEETING_NAME, A.MEETING_COUNT, A.IMAGE, A.CAPACITY, A.MEETING_START_AT, A.MEETING_END_AT, A.CATEGORY, A.MEETING_CONTENT, A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_GENDER, A.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_BIRTHYEAR, A.USER_BIRTHDATE, A.USER_PROFILE, A.USER_INTRODUCE, A.USER_GRADE FROM (SELECT M.MEETING_NO, M.MEETING_NAME, M.MEETING_COUNT, M.IMAGE, M.CAPACITY, M.MEETING_START_AT, M.MEETING_END_AT, M.CATEGORY, M.MEETING_CONTENT, U.USER_NO, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_GENDER, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_BIRTHYEAR, U.USER_BIRTHDATE, U.USER_PROFILE, U.USER_INTRODUCE, U.USER_GRADE FROM MEETING_T AS M INNER JOIN USER_T AS U ON M.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) AS A WHERE A.MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo} AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo}
